Job Description: Job Description     This is an opening for TFS customer. Ideal candidate will have hands on experience in developing software using C++ and OOPS and Design Patterns.        This role might involve direct customer interaction and the candidate is expected to have excellent verbal/written communication skills.              About The Role:              You will work with us from our Lancohills, Hyderabad office as C++ Developer in our medical domain team. You will report to project manager.              You Will:              Substantiated knowledge in C++ / OOPS Experienced in overall design using design patterns Hands-on with Multi-threading application development              Youll Need:              Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent Professional.       6+ years of experience in application development using C++/OOPS with good knowledge on web development.       Fluency in English (both writing and speaking)        Skills Experience   C , Object Oriented Design Patterns, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
